lines.text: They gots the battle but the war goes on.

[after beating the hell out of another woman]
Sorry for the rude interruption.

[to the people at the bank they're robbing]
Ladies and gentleman, thanks for your cooperation.
Look at him! A man who goes on about gang wars and can't even hold his own against a woman!
Big Daddy, I wish you would've changed your mind and gone back home. Well, I guess it's about that time.
Girl, where did you learn to handle a shotgun like that?
